feed.title: W-Square
feed.subtitle: A minimal, responsive and feature-rich Jekyll theme for technical writing.

entry.title: Setting up my personal blog website!

link.title: Setting up my personal blog website!

entry.summary:
Lessons Learned for Jekyll
Today is a big day! I’ve finally set up my personal website (special thanks to my friend Veronica ! This milestone has motivated me to start posting my study notes and thoughts. I firmly believe that learning by sharing and creating outputs is the most effective way to internalize knowledge.
Here are some challenges I encountered while setting up the website and ...
